Control.Name: Chat
Control.Tooltip: Uses the ingame chat to communicate with other players. (only reaches players from your server and faction) - Recommended!

Control.Name: ICComm
Control.Tooltip: Uses the addon communication to communicate with other players. (reaches players on all servers/factions of your region but can be very slow)

Control.Text: Making this Addon was a lot of work!
Control.Name: TextLine1

Control.Text: Please consider supporting the continued development and maintenance of LUI Hold'em with an ingame gold donation.
Control.Name: TextLine2

Control.Text: Thank you very much in advcance! <3
Control.Name: TextLine3
BtnSitout
Control.Tooltip: You automatically gonna fold each round, but still have to pay blinds.

Control.Name: BtnLock
Control.Tooltip: Prevents new players from joining the table.

Control.Name: PauseCheckbox
Control.Text: Pause Game when entering combat (host only)
